alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 7:03AM EST until February 20 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Maumee River At Waterville affecting Wood and Lucas Counties. For the Maumee River...including Waterville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Maumee River At Waterville. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, A few riverside cabins in Waterville become threatened. Lowland flooding occurs along with some water inundation on River Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM EST Saturday the stage was 10.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 11.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.1 feet on 05/03/1983. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon by 500 PM EST.
